translation: This is the bodhisattva Mahāsattva who can't understand the aggregates' demonic activity, can't understand the death demonic activity, can't understand the heavenly demonic activity, and can't understand the afflictive demonic activity, and this is the cause and condition that makes it easy for Māra.

source_sentence: 由此因緣令魔得便，方便化作種種形像，語此菩薩摩訶薩言：『汝所修行願行已滿，當證無上正等菩提，汝成佛時當得如是殊勝功德尊貴名號。』
translation: This cause and condition allowed Māra to skillfully conjure up various forms and images, telling this bodhisattva Mahāsattva, 'Once you've fulfilled your vows and practices, you will realize unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, and when you become a buddha, you will attain the distinguished and honored name of Such Exceptional Merit.'
Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 謂彼惡魔知此菩薩長夜思願：『我成佛時當得如是功德名號。』
translation: That evil demon knows that this bodhisattva has long vowed, 'When I become a buddha, I'll attain this meritorious name.'
He then remembers and explains it according to that longing.
"Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 時此菩薩遠離般若波羅蜜多，無巧便故，聞魔記說，作是念言：『奇哉！
translation: When this bodhisattva, who was far removed from the perfection of wisdom and had no skillful means, heard what Māra had told him and had this thought, 'Amazing!

source_sentence: 是人為我記說當得成佛功德名號，與我長夜思願相應，由此故知過去諸佛必已授我大菩提記，我於無上正等菩提決定當得不復退轉，我成佛時必定當得如是功德尊貴名號。』
translation: That person remembers for me the name of the merit of becoming a buddha that will surely match my long-night meditation and vow, so I know that the buddhas of the past must have granted me the mark of great enlightenment, that I will surely attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment and never turn back, and that I will surely attain such a meritorious and honorable name when I become a buddha.'
"Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩如是惡魔、或魔眷屬、或魔所執諸沙門等記說當來成佛名號，如是如是慢心轉增：『我於未來定當作佛，獲得如是功德名號，諸餘菩薩無與我等。』
translation: When this bodhisattva Mahāsattva is told by such evil demons, or by their followers, or by ascetics held by demons, that he will become a buddha in the future, his arrogance increases as he says, 'I will certainly become a buddha in the future and attain a name of such merit that no other bodhisattva will ever equal me.'
"Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 如我所說已得不退轉菩薩摩訶薩諸行、狀、相，此菩薩摩訶薩皆未成就，但聞魔說成佛虛名便生傲慢，輕弄毀蔑諸餘菩薩摩訶薩眾。
translation: Just as I've described the irreversible bodhisattva's actions, appearance, and form, this bodhisattva-mahāsattva has yet to achieve them, but when he hears Māra's false claim of becoming a buddha, he becomes arrogant and disparages the other bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas.
"Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩由起傲慢輕弄毀蔑諸餘菩薩摩訶薩故，遠離無上正等菩提。
translation: As a result of this bodhisattva's arrogance and disdain for the other bodhisattvas, he's distantly removed from unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.
Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩遠離般若波羅蜜多，無巧便故，棄善友故，常為惡友所攝受故，當墮聲聞或獨覺地。
translation: Because this bodhisattva Mahāsattva is estranged from the perfection of wisdom, lacks skillful means, and abandons good friends, he'll always be taken in by bad friends, and will fall into the stage of śrāvaka or pratyekabuddha.
"Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩或有此身還得正念，至誠悔過捨舊慢心，數數親近供養恭敬、尊重讚歎真勝善友，彼雖流轉生死多時，而後還依甚深般若波羅蜜多漸次修學，當證無上正等菩提。
translation: Perhaps this is a bodhisattva who returns to right mindfulness in this body, sincerely repents and rejects old pride, and repeatedly approaches, pays respect to, honors, and praises a truly excellent friend, who, despite having transited through birth and death for many lifetimes, gradually cultivates the profound perfection of wisdom and will realize unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.
Well done, Vairocana!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩若有此身不得正念，不能悔過，不捨慢心，不欲親近供養恭敬、尊重讚歎真勝善友，彼定流轉生死多時，後雖精進修諸善業，而墮聲聞或獨覺地。
translation: If this bodhisattva-mahāsattva doesn't have right mindfulness of this body, doesn't repent of faults, doesn't abandon conceit, and doesn't want to be close to, honor, respect, and praise a truly excellent friend, he'll surely be reborn in death for a long time, and even though he makes effort to cultivate good actions later, he'll fall into the stage of śrāvaka or pratyekabuddha.
"Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 譬如苾芻求聲聞者，於四重罪若隨犯一，便非沙門、非釋迦子，彼於現在定不能得預流、一來、不還應果。
translation: For example, if a monk seeking to become a direct disciple commits one of the four grave crimes, he's not an ascetic or a son of the Śākyas, and he certainly won't attain the fruits of stream-winner, once-returner, or nonreturner in the present.
Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 妄執虛名菩薩亦爾，但聞魔記成佛空名便起慢心，輕弄毀蔑諸餘菩薩摩訶薩眾，當知此罪過彼苾芻所犯四重無量倍數。
translation: "So is the bodhisattva who falsely clings to false names, becomes arrogant after hearing that Māra has memorized the empty name of Buddhahood, and then gently disparages the other bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas, knowing that this offense is immeasurably greater than the four grave offenses committed by that monk.
Well done, sir!

source_sentence: 置彼苾芻所犯四重，此菩薩罪過五無間亦無量倍。
translation: If we put aside the four grave offenses committed by that monk, this bodhisattva's offense is infinitely greater than the five kinds of unremitting offenses.
Why is that?
Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩實不成就殊勝功德，聞惡魔說成佛名號，便自傲慢輕餘菩薩，是故此罪過五無間。
translation: This is a bodhisattva who really hasn't achieved extraordinary virtue and who, after hearing a bad demon preach the name of a accomplished buddha, becomes proud and despises other bodhisattvas, which is a misdeed that has five interminable consequences.
Therefore, good performance!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩欲得無上正等菩提，應善覺知如是記說虛名號等微細魔事。
translation: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva wants to attain unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment, he should well perceive such subtle demonic things as the prediction of false names and so forth.
"Furthermore, well-presented!

source_sentence: 有菩薩摩訶薩隱在山林、空澤、曠野，獨居宴坐，修遠離行。
translation: There was a bodhisattva Mahāsattva who was hidden away in a mountain forest, a hollow, or a wilderness, living alone and sitting in repose, cultivating the practice of seclusion.

source_sentence: 時，有惡魔來到其所，恭敬讚歎遠離功德，謂作是言：『善哉！
translation: When a demon came to him, he respectfully praised the merits of seclusion and said, 'Good!
Mañjuśrī!

source_sentence: 能修如是遠離之行，此遠離行一切如來、應、正等覺共所稱讚，天帝釋等諸天神仙皆共守護供養尊重，應常住此勿往餘處。』
translation: Those who cultivate such an isolating practice, which is praised by all tathāgatas, worthies, and correct enlightenment, and which is guarded, offered, and respected by gods and sages like Indra, should always abide here and not go to other places.'
'Good performance!

source_sentence: 我不讚歎諸菩薩摩訶薩居阿練若、曠野、山林，宴坐思惟修遠離行。」
translation: I don't praise those bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas who live in a forest or wilderness, sit in contemplation, and cultivate practices that are isolated."
It was then that the good present said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩應修何等餘遠離行，而佛不讚居阿練若、曠野、山林，離諸臥具，思惟宴坐遠離功德？
translation: What other kinds of seclusion practices should bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas practice that the Buddha doesn't praise as merits of seclusion while staying in a forest or wilderness, secluded from bedding, or contemplating sitting or relaxing?

source_sentence: 唯願為說諸菩薩摩訶薩勝遠離行！」
translation: May I explain for you the excellent and far-reaching practices of the bodhisattvas, the mahāsattvas!"
The Buddha said, "Good performance!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩若居山林、空澤、曠野、阿練若處，若居城邑、聚落、王都、諠雜之處，但能遠離煩惱惡業，遠離聲聞、獨覺作意，勤修般若波羅蜜多，及修諸餘殊勝功德，是名菩薩真遠離行。
translation: If bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas live in a forest, a hollow, a wilderness, or an araṇya place, or if they live in a city, a town, a village, a royal capital, or a crowded place, but they can part with the bad karma of affliction, part with the contemplations of direct disciples and solitary realizers, and diligently cultivate the perfection of wisdom and cultivate other excellent qualities, this is called a bodhisattva who truly parts with practice.
"Good performance!

source_sentence: 此遠離行一切如來、應、正等覺共所稱讚，此遠離行一切如來、應、正等覺共所開許。
translation: This isolated practice is praised by all tathāgatas, worthies, and correct enlightenment in common, and this isolated practice is approved by all tathāgatas, worthies, and correct enlightenment in common.
"Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 此遠離行諸菩薩摩訶薩常應修學，若晝若夜應正思惟，精進修行此遠離法，是名菩薩修遠離行。
translation: These secluded practices should always be cultivated by bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas, and they should correctly contemplate and energetically cultivate these secluded qualities day and night, which is called a bodhisattva cultivating secluded practices.
"Good performance!

source_sentence: 此遠離行不雜聲聞、獨覺作意，不雜一切煩惱惡業，離諸諠雜，畢竟清淨，令諸菩薩速證無上正等菩提，利樂有情，窮未來際，常無斷盡。
translation: These practices of seclusion don't mix with the contemplations of direct disciples and solitary realizers, don't mix with all the bad karma of affliction, and are free of all the clutter that ultimately purifies them, so that bodhisattvas quickly realize unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, which benefits and delights sentient beings and remains uninterrupted for as long as the future lasts.
"Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 惡魔所讚隱在山林、空澤、曠野、阿練若處，遠離臥具，獨居宴坐，非諸菩薩勝遠離行。
translation: Praised by Māra for staying hidden away in a mountain forest, a hollow, a wilderness, or an alembic place, secluded from bedding, and sitting alone, these aren't the superior isolation practices of bodhisattvas.
Why is that?
Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 彼遠離行猶有諠雜，謂彼或雜惡業煩惱，或雜聲聞、獨覺作意，於深般若波羅蜜多不能精勤信受修學，不能圓滿一切智智。
translation: Their secluded practice is still complicated, meaning that it's sometimes complicated by the afflictions of bad karma or by the contemplations of direct disciples and solitary realizers, which prevent them from diligently believing and cultivating the profound prajñāpāramitā and from perfecting the knowledge of all things.
"Good performance!

source_sentence: 有菩薩摩訶薩雖勤修習惡魔所讚遠離行法，而起傲慢不清淨心，輕弄毀蔑諸餘菩薩摩訶薩眾。
translation: "Are there bodhisattvas, though they diligently cultivate the practice of seclusion praised by evil demons, who become arrogant and impure, and who despise and disparage the rest of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva community?

source_sentence: 謂有菩薩摩訶薩眾雖居城邑、聚落、王都而心清淨，不雜種種煩惱惡業，不雜聲聞、獨覺作意，精勤修習布施、淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多，精勤安住內空、外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空，精勤安住真如、法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界，精勤安住苦、集、滅、道聖諦，精勤修習四念住、四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支，於四靜慮、四無量、四無色定、五神通等世間功德修已圓滿，精勤修習空、無相、無願解脫門，精勤修習五眼、六神通，精勤修習陀羅尼門、三摩地門，精勤修習佛十力、四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法，精勤修習無忘失法、恒住捨性，精勤修習一切智、道相智、一切相智，嚴淨佛土、成熟有情，雖居憒閙而心寂靜，恒勤修習勝遠離行。
translation: 謂有菩薩摩訶薩眾雖居城邑、聚落、王都而心清淨，不雜種種煩惱惡業，不雜聲聞、獨覺作意，精勤修習布施、淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多，精勤安住內空、外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空，精勤安住真如、法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界，精勤安住苦、集、滅、道聖諦，精勤修習四念住、四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支，於四靜慮、四無量、四無色定、五神通等世間功德修已圓滿，精勤修習空、無相、無願解脫門，精勤修習五眼、六神通，精勤修習陀羅尼門、三摩地門，精勤修習佛十力、四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法，精勤修習無忘失法、恒住捨性，精勤修習一切智、道相智、一切相智，嚴淨佛土、成熟有情，雖居憒閙而心寂靜，恒勤修習勝遠離行。

source_sentence: 彼於如是真淨菩薩摩訶薩眾，心生憍慢，輕弄毀訾，誹謗凌蔑。
translation: In this truly pure bodhisattva-mahāsattva assembly, they become proud at heart, despise and disparage them, and denigrate them.
"Good performance!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩遠離般若波羅蜜多，無巧便故，設居曠野百踰繕那，其中絕無諸惡禽獸、蛇、蝎、盜賊，唯有神、鬼、邏剎娑等遊止其中。
translation: Being free of the perfection of wisdom, the bodhisattva Mahāsattva, without skillful means, sets up residence in a wilderness for a hundred yojanas, in which there are no unwholesome animals, snakes, scorpions, or thieves, but only spirits, ghosts, and lakṣasas roaming about.

source_sentence: 彼居如是阿練若處，雖經一歲，或經十歲、或經百歲、或經千歲、或經百千歲、或經俱胝歲、或經百俱胝歲、或經千俱胝歲、或經百千俱胝歲，或復過此，修遠離行，而不了知諸菩薩摩訶薩真遠離行。
translation: Although they live in such a forest for one year, or for ten years, or for a hundred years, or for a thousand years, or for a hundred thousand years, or for a corpuscle, or for a hundred corpuscles, or for a thousand corpuscles, or for a hundred thousand corpuscles, or for another hundred thousand corpuscles, they cultivate isolation practices and don't know the true isolation practices of the bodhisattvas, the mahāsattvas, until they pass through them.

source_sentence: 謂諸菩薩摩訶薩眾雖居憒鬧而心寂靜，遠離種種煩惱惡業，發趣無上正等菩提，遠離聲聞、獨覺作意。
translation: That is, although they live in the hustle and bustle, the bodhisattvas, the mahāsattvas, and their minds are calm, free of the various afflictive and bad activities, destined for unsurpassed correct enlightenment, and free of the contemplations of śrāvakas and solitary realizers.

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩雖居曠野經歷多時，而雜聲聞、獨覺作意，樂著聲聞、獨覺地法，依止彼法修遠離行，復於此行深生愛著。
translation: Although they live in the wilderness for many hours, these bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas are mixed with the contemplations of śrāvakas and pratyekbuddhas, are delighted to be attached to the teachings of śrāvakas and pratyekbuddhas, cultivate isolation practices based on those teachings, and become deeply attached to those practices.
Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 彼雖如是修遠離行，而不稱順諸如來心。
translation: Although they thus cultivate practices that are isolated, they don't praise the minds of the Tathāgatas.
"Good performance!

source_sentence: 我所稱讚諸菩薩摩訶薩真遠離行，是菩薩摩訶薩都不成就，彼於真勝遠離行中亦不見有相似行相。
translation: "The truly isolated actions of the bodhisattvas, which I praise, are not accomplished by any of these bodhisattvas, and they don't see similar actions in their truly superior isolated actions.
Why is that?

source_sentence: 彼於如是真遠離行不生愛樂，但樂修行聲聞、獨覺空遠離行。
translation: They don't have cravings for such truly isolated practices, but are happy to cultivate the practice of śrāvakas and solitary realizers as empty and isolated practices.
"Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩修不真勝遠離行時，魔來空中，歡喜讚歎告言：『大士！
translation: When this bodhisattva Mahāsattva was cultivating the practice of seclusion from the unreal, Māra came into the air, rejoiced and praised him, saying, 'Maestro!
Bravo!
Bravo!

source_sentence: 汝能修行真遠離行，此遠離行一切如來、應、正等覺共所稱讚，汝於此行精勤修習，速證無上正等菩提。』
translation: You can practice the truly isolated practice that's praised by all tathāgatas, worthies, and correct enlightenment, and you can quickly realize unsurpassed perfect enlightenment by diligently cultivating this practice.'
"Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩執著如是聲聞、獨覺遠離行法以為最勝，輕弄毀蔑住菩薩乘雖居憒閙而心寂靜成調善法諸苾芻等言：『彼不能修遠離行，身居憒閙心不寂靜。』
translation: Such bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and solitary realizers cling to such isolated practices as the best, and they despise and disparage bodhisattvas who abide in the vehicle even though their bodies are in a state of anxiety and their minds are tranquil.
Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於諸如來、應、正等覺共所稱讚住真遠離行菩薩摩訶薩輕弄毀蔑，謂居憒閙心不寂靜，不能修行真遠離行；於諸如來、應、正等覺所不稱讚住真諠雜行菩薩摩訶薩尊重讚歎，謂不諠雜其心寂靜，能正修行真遠離行。
translation: "This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattva who despises and disparages the tathāgatas, arhats, and fully awakened ones who are praised in common for abiding in true detached practice, which means that they live in agitation and their minds aren't calm, and they can't cultivate true detached practice; and the bodhisattva-mahāsattva who respects and praises the tathāgatas, arhats, and fully awakened ones who aren't praised for abiding in true and complicated practice, which means that they are unconfused and their minds are calm, and they can correctly cultivate true detached practice.
Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於應親近供養恭敬如大師者，而不親近供養恭敬，反生輕蔑；於應遠離不應承事如惡友者，而不遠離，供養恭敬如事大師。
translation: Such a bodhisattva does not intimately make offerings to and respect those who should be as venerable as the great teacher, but instead despises them; he doesn't distance himself from those who should not serve him as bad friends, but he doesn't distance himself from them, making offerings to and respecting them as he serves the great teacher.
"Good performance!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩遠離般若波羅蜜多，無巧便故妄生執著。
translation: "This is a bodhisattva who is free of the perfection of wisdom and who deludedly becomes attached because he has no skillful means.
Why is that?

source_sentence: 彼作是念：『我所修行是真遠離，故為非人稱讚護念。
translation: They think, 'This practice of mine is truly isolated, so it's praised and guarded by no one.

source_sentence: 居城邑者身心擾亂，誰當護念恭敬稱美？』
translation: Who will protect, honor, and praise a person who lives in a town that's physically and mentally disturbed?'
Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩由此因緣心多傲慢，輕弄毀蔑諸餘菩薩摩訶薩眾，煩惱惡業晝夜增長。
translation: As a result of this, that bodhisattva-mahāsattva becomes arrogant at heart, despises and disparages the other bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas, and his afflictions and bad karma increase day and night.
You should well know!

source_sentence: 是菩薩摩訶薩於諸菩薩為旃荼羅穢污菩薩摩訶薩眾，雖似菩薩摩訶薩相，而是天上人中大賊，誑惑天、人、阿素洛等，其身雖服沙門法衣，而心常懷盜賊意樂。
translation: "Although he appears to be a bodhisattva, he's a great thief among men in heaven who deceives gods, humans, asuras, and so forth, and although he wears the ascetic's robes, his mind always harbors the desire to steal.

source_sentence: 諸有發趣菩薩乘者，不應親近供養恭敬、尊重讚歎如是惡人，何以故？
translation: Those who have set out for the bodhisattva vehicle shouldn't get close to, support, honor, respect, and praise such a bad person.
You should know it well!

source_sentence: 是人懷增上慢，外似菩薩內多煩惱。
translation: That person harbors arrogance, and outwardly they look like a bodhisattva with lots of internal afflictions.
Therefore, good performance!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩真實不捨一切智智，不捨無上正等菩提，深心求證一切智智，求證無上正等菩提，普為利樂諸有情者，不應親近供養恭敬、尊重讚歎如是惡人。
translation: If bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and true believers don't abandon omniscience, don't abandon unsurpassed correct enlightenment, and deeply pursue the realization of omniscience and unsurpassed correct enlightenment for the general welfare of sentient beings, they shouldn't approach, support, respect, venerate, and praise such a bad person.
"Good manifestation!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩常應精進修自事業，厭離生死不著三界，於彼惡賊旃荼羅人，應常發心慈、悲、喜、捨，應作是念：『我不應起如彼惡人所起過患，設當失念如彼暫起，即應覺知速令除滅。』
translation: All bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, should always make effort to cultivate their own works, become disillusioned with birth and death, and not be attached to the three realms; when dealing with that villainous person Candra, they should always be mindful of kindness, pity, joy, and equanimity and should think, 'I shouldn't give rise to the faults caused by that bad person; if I lose mindfulness of what's temporarily caused by that person, then I should realize that I should quickly get rid of it.'
Well done, Sugata!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩摩訶薩欲證無上正等菩提，應善覺知如是魔事，應勤精進遠離除滅如彼菩薩所起過患。
translation: All bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas who want to realize unsurpassed correct enlightenment should well perceive such demonic conditions and should diligently work to avoid and eliminate the faults caused by bodhisattvas like those.
"Furthermore, good performance!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩增上意樂，欲證無上正等菩提，常應親近供養恭敬、尊重讚歎真勝善友。」
translation: If bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and bodhisattvas have intensified aspirations and want to realize unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, they should always approach, support, respect, venerate, and praise truly excellent and good friends."

source_sentence: 時，具壽善現白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Kauśāmbī then said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 何等名為諸菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友？」
translation: What are these truly excellent good friends of the bodhisattvas, the mahāsattvas?"
The Buddha said, "Good performance!

source_sentence: 一切如來、應、正等覺是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，一切菩薩摩訶薩亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，諸有聲聞及餘善士能為菩薩摩訶薩眾宣說、開示、分別、顯了布施、淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多相應之法令易解者，當知亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: "All tathāgatas, arhats, and fully enlightened ones are truly excellent good friends of the bodhisattvas, and all bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and bodhisattvas are truly excellent good friends of the bodhisattvas. Any śrāvaka or other good person who can explain, reveal, discern, and make clear to the bodhisattvas what generosity, pure morality, patience, effort, meditation, and prajñāpāramit are and how they should be understood should be known as a truly excellent good friend of the bodhisattvas.
"Good presenters, you should know!

source_sentence: 布施波羅蜜多是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: The perfection of generosity is a truly excellent good friend of the bodhisattva Mahāsattva, and the perfections of pure morality, patience, effort, meditation, and wisdom are also truly excellent good friends of the bodhisattva Mahāsattva.
"You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 四念住是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: The four abodes of mindfulness are truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattvas, and the four correct eliminations, four miraculous powers, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of virtual enlightenment, and eight noble factors of the path are also truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattvas.
"You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 四靜慮是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，四無量、四無色定亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: The four meditations are truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattvas, and the four immeasurable and four formless concentrations are also truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattvas.
"You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 八解脫是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，八勝處、九次第定、十遍處亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: The eight liberations are truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattvas, and the eight abodes of excellence, nine graduated concentrations, and ten universal abodes are also truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattvas.
"You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 空解脫門是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，無相、無願解脫門亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: The liberation through emptiness is a truly excellent and good friend of the bodhisattvas, and the liberation through signlessness and wishlessness is also a truly excellent and good friend of the bodhisattvas.
"You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 極喜地是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: The ground of ultimate joy is a truly excellent and good friend of the bodhisattvas, and the ground of freedom from pollution, the ground of the emission of light, the ground of burning wisdom, the ground of extreme difficulty, the ground of direct presence, the ground of distant practice, the ground of immovability, the ground of good wisdom, and the ground of the dharma-cloud are also truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattvas.
"You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 五眼是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，六神通亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: The five eyes are truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattvas, and the six supernormal powers are truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattvas.
"You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 三摩地門是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，陀羅尼門亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: The approach of samādhi is a truly excellent and good friend of the bodhisattvas, and the approach of dhāraṇī is a truly excellent and good friend of the bodhisattvas.
"You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 佛十力是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: The Buddha's ten powers are truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattvas, and the four fearlessnesses, four unhindered understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and 18 uncommon dharmas of the Buddhas are also truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattvas.
"You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 無忘失法是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，恒住捨性亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: The Dharma of no forgetfulness is a truly excellent and good friend of the bodhisattvas, and the nature of constantly abiding in equanimity is also a truly excellent and good friend of the bodhisattvas.
"You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 永斷一切煩惱習氣是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: Permanently eliminating all afflictive karmic impressions is a truly excellent, good friend of the bodhisattvas, the Mahāsattvas.
"You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 一切智是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，道相智、一切相智亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: Omniscience is a truly excellent and good friend of the bodhisattva Mahāsattva, and knowledge of the path and omniscience are also truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattva Mahāsattva.
"You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 一切菩薩摩訶薩行是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，諸佛無上正等菩提亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: All bodhisattva-mahāsattva practices are truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattvas, and the buddhas' unsurpassed correct enlightenment is truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattvas.
"You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 苦聖諦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，集、滅、道聖諦亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: The noble truth of suffering is a truly superior and good friend of the bodhisattva Mahāsattva, and the noble truths of accumulation, cessation, and the path are also truly superior and good friends of the bodhisattva Mahāsattva.
"Good presently you should know!

source_sentence: 諸法緣性是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，諸緣起支亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: The conditional nature of all dharmas is a truly excellent and good friend of the bodhisattvas, and the links of dependent arising are also truly excellent and good friends of the bodhisattvas.
"You should know this, good present!

source_sentence: 內空是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
translation: Internal emptiness is the bodhisattva Mahāsattva's true and excellent good friend, and external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness without limit, dispersed emptiness, emptiness without change, emptiness of original nature, emptiness of own-form, emptiness of shared form, emptiness of all things, inaccessible emptiness, emptiness without nature, emptiness of self-nature, and emptiness of natureless self-nature are also the bodhisattva Mahāsattva's true and excellent good friends.
"You should know this well, now!

source_sentence: 真如是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友，法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界亦是菩薩摩訶薩真勝善友。
